Package com.im.njams.sdk.communication.http

Class SharedHttpSseReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.AbstractReceiver
      • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.http.HttpSseReceiver
        • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.http.SharedHttpSseReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Receiver, SenderExceptionListener, ShareableReceiver<Map<String,​String>>, com.launchdarkly.eventsource.background.BackgroundEventHandler
    public class SharedHttpSseReceiver
extends HttpSseReceiver
implements ShareableReceiver<Map<String,​String>>
    Overrides the common HttpSseReceiver for supporting receiving messages for multiple Njams instances.
    Author:
    bwand
